prompts.title: Minimalist Loft Creative Portrait
prompts.promptText: A stylish professional portrait of a creative director in a minimalist loft studio. The subject wears a structured linen blazer over a casual t-shirt. Seated on a vintage stool, leaning forward slightly with elbows on knees, engaging the camera. Lighting is soft and diffused natural light coming from a large north-facing window, creating a wrap-around effect. The color palette is neutral earth tones (beige, cream, olive).

prompts.title: Cappuccino Shipyard Fantasy
prompts.promptText: { "id": "scene_cappuccino_shipyard", "subject": { "team": "Miniature dockworkers and sailors", "action": "Constructing and repairing foam ships drifting across a cappuccino surface", "details": [ "Workers rowing through milk foam in bottle-cap boats", "Latte art waves reshaped into docks", "Tiny lifebuoys made from sugar rings" ] }, "environment": { "macro_object": "Fresh cappuccino with dense foam and crema swirls", "background": "Coffee cup rim towering like harbor walls, spoon blurred in distance", "lighting": "Soft café lighting with warm reflections, steam catching highlights" }, "mood": "Cozy maritime fantasy with café warmth", "style": "Hyper-real macro realism, cinematic depth, tilt-shift micro-world aesthetic" }

prompts.title: Film Camera Coastal Nook
prompts.promptText: A miniature coastal living space built inside the hollow body of an old film camera. Inside, a person lounges on a small sofa facing a panoramic window that reveals rolling ocean waves. Seashells, a model sailboat, and scattered photographs decorate the room. Sunlight streams through the lens opening, creating soft lens flares and realistic reflections. Ultra-detailed metal textures, cinematic macro depth, calm and nostalgic atmosphere.

prompts.title: Cozy Winter Train Portrait
prompts.promptText: { "image_prompt": { "reference": { "face_identity": "uploaded reference image", "identity_lock": true, "face_preservation": "100% identical facial structure, proportions, skin texture, eye shape, lips, nose, brows, moles, and natural expression" }, "subject": { "type": "young woman", "expression": "soft, relaxed smile", "gaze": "looking gently toward the camera", "pose": { "position": "leaning out of a train window", "arms": "both arms resting on the window frame", "posture": "relaxed and cozy" } }, "environment": { "location": "inside a red panoramic train traveling through snowy mountains" }, "lighting": { "type": "natural cold daylight" }, "photography_style": { "style": "cinematic travel portrait" } } }

prompts.title: Vintage Matchbox Noir
prompts.promptText: A hyper-detailed miniature diorama hidden inside an open vintage matchbox. Within the narrow space, a lone figure sits at a tiny café table under a flickering neon sign while rain streaks down invisible glass walls. A miniature espresso cup steams gently, puddles reflect warm light, and a folded newspaper rests on the table. Cool blue rain lighting contrasts with warm interior glow. Photorealistic paper fibers, handcrafted props, macro lens compression, cinematic noir mood.
